title: S8E11 – "Times of Reckoning" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Wentz Hesselman, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about malevolent memories, deadly dolls, chilling charades, and ravenous religions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
